FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_ENCODING
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.Encoding'

FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_HOST
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.server'

FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_PROTOCOL
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.Protocol'

FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_USER
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.User'

FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_PASSWORD
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.Password'

FunctionColumn.name: MAIL_PROPERTIES
FunctionColumn.value: SELECT VALOR FROM CDPREFSERVIDOR WHERE NOMBRE = 'Mail.Properties'
